K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-14: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-15: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-19: gang la spyod pa de'ang mi dmigs te; rab 'byor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-20: gang la spyod pa de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-24: gal te de ltar spyod pa ma mchis pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa lags na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-26: las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod par bgyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:156b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-0: 'di ltar las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po @157a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-1: bskyed pa nas brtsams te chos thams cad dmigs su med pa la bslab par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-2: des sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-3: tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-4: bzod pa sgrub pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-5: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-6: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-7: shes rab bsgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-8: nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-9: phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-11: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157a-12: chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-0: 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i @157b tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-1: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-2: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-3: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-4: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-5: rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:157b-6: chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:255b-19: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-0: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la @256a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-2: dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-6: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-16: chos rmad du byang ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-18: gtan la phab pa bsten pa gang ci gsungs kyang de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-19: yongs su bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-20: yid kyis shin tu brtags pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-21: lta bas rab tu khong du chud par byas shing gzungs rab tu thob par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-22: gzungs rab tu thob nas so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256a-23: so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed pas de'i tshe rnam par 'phos kyang chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur gyi bar du nam yang chung za bar mi 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-0: de @256b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-1: nam yang ngan song dang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-3: lus de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-4: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i legs pa ston pa dag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-17: bam po nyis brgya re drug pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:256b-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:257b-13: gang de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu dag la'ang ma bsten pas /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:258a-20: de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:258b-8: bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:258b-9: kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te; mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:258b-22: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-9: rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-10: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-12: smon pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-13: mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-14: ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-15: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-17: mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-18: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-19: byams pa chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489a-20: snying rje chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @489b pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-1: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-2: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-3: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-4: dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-5: rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-6: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-9: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-10: smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas; chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-11: mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-12: sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-13: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:489b-14: sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam @490a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-2: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-3: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-4: nye bar len pa'i phur po lnga chu zla lta bur shes; nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga mig yor lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-5: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-6: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-7: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-8: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-19: lam gyi khongs su chud pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-21: de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-22: chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-26: mi spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung po //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-27: de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan pa'ang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490a-28: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-0: khyim bdag che zhing @490b mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-2: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-4: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-10: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-12: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-19: zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-23: 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-24: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-25: mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-27: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:490b-28: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongs su rdzogs @491a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-4: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-7: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-9: de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang 'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-15: nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-20: de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-21: sems can dang sems can du btags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs @491b rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pas sprul par mdzad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-1: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-3: de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-7: 'du byed dam; rnam par shes pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-8: dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-11: sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:491b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-0: de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par @492a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-2: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-7: sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-8: mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-10: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-12: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-14: nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-15: chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-16: de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-17: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492a-18: mi snyan par brjod cing ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer bar gyur tam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-0: @492b btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-1: gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-2: phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-3: nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-4: 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi skyed kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-6: bdag nyid kyis phung po'i dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-7: byams pa dang ldan te snying rje par gyur nas rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-8: nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-9: de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-10: sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na; bdag la gshe ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-12: ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-13: rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-14: 'du byed thams cad ni; sgyu ma lta bu gsob /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-17: nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-25: shed bdag dang bral ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-26: rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-27: yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:492b-29: mi snyan par brjod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-2: rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-3: bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-4: don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-5: de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-7: chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-8: de de ltar yongs su rtog cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-9: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-12: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-20: chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-22: de gang gis shes pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-24: shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-26: bcom ldan 'das; nyan thos rnams dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-27: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci mchis /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493a-31: rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-0: spang @493b pa gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-2: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-3: spangs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-5: phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-6: spangs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-8: dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-9: spangs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-12: spangs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-21: bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-22: rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-23: de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-25: de yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:493b-28: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-1: pa lnga dang mi 'bral ba yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-2: de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-4: de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-15: sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-16: de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-024-001:494a-17: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
